meanings.definition: Resembling a pot in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The round, potlike vase sat on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The potlike flowerpot was perfect for the plant.
meanings.sent3: The potlike teapot seemed to have a personality of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her head was spinning, feeling potlike as she tried to make sense of it all.
meanings.sent5: The potlike cloud hovered in the sky, casting a shadow over the field.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to a pot.
meanings.sent1: The heavy, potlike stew simmered on the stove.
meanings.sent2: The potlike aroma of soup filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The potlike sound of the lid clanging echoed through the house.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt potlike, full and warm with love for his family.
meanings.sent5: The potlike warmth of the fireplace was comforting on a cold night.
